channel.title: Digitalpreservation on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Digitalpreservation on Nicola Iarocci
channel.copyright: Produced / Written / Maintained by Nicola Iarocci since 2010

item.title: The Internet is Rotting
item.description:
Terrific piece by Jonathan Zittrain, on The Atlantic, on link rot and digital preservation. I love how well documented and informative it is. Yet, it remains perfectly approachable for both the non-knowledgeable reader and the technically savvy.

Too much has been lost already. The glue that holds humanity’s knowledge together is coming undone.

We need more content like this.
item.content:encoded:
Terrific piece by Jonathan Zittrain, on The Atlantic, on link rot and digital preservation. I love how well documented and informative it is. Yet, it remains perfectly approachable for both the non-knowledgeable reader and the technically savvy.

Too much has been lost already. The glue that holds humanity’s knowledge together is coming undone.

We need more content like this.
